item.title: Better MVVM setup with POP and Runtime
item.description:
Even if we are writing pure Swift code in our app, we still deal with Objective-C Frameworks like UIKit.

Let’s take a look at how we can improve our MVVM architecture by leveraging a little bit of Objective-C runtime and Protocol Oriented Programming.

item.title: Using UIGestureRecognizers in cocos2d
item.description:
cocos2d is one of the best gaming framework I’ve seen, but it doesn’t use UIKit.

When Apple introduced UIGestureRecognizers they unified how touch interaction should work.

Is there a way we can add UIGestureRecognizers to cocos2d architecture, without modyfing cocos2d source?
